mapper.select: /* get_total_jointBrokerage_ */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINT_BROKERAGE WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: /* jointBrokerage_insert */ INSERT INTO JOINT_BROKERAGE (SHARE_YN, TITLE, TYPE, VIDEO_NAME, VIDEO_PATH, ALL_AREA, EXCLUSIVE_AREA, COMMON_AREA, MAINTENANCE_COST, MAINTENANCE_COST_LIST, MAINTENANCE_COST_OUT_LIST, ALL_PARKING_CNT, ONE_PARKING_CNT, DIRECTION, HEATING_SYSTEM, BUILT_IN_YN, ELEVATOR_YN, VERANDA_YN, PURPOSE, APPROVAL_DATE, MOVE_IN_START_DATE, `OPTION`, SECURITY, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, MASTER_TEL, BROKER_TEL, MEMO, STATUS, REGDATE, REGID, MODDATE, MODID) VALUES (#{share_yn}, #{title}, #{type}, #{video_name}, #{video_path}, #{all_area}, #{exclusive_area}, #{common_area}, #{maintenance_cost}, #{maintenance_cost_list}, #{maintenance_cost_out_list}, #{all_parking_cnt}, #{one_parking_cnt}, #{direction}, #{heating_system}, #{built_in_yn}, #{elevator_yn}, #{veranda_yn}, #{purpose}, #{approval_date}, #{option}, #{move_in_start_date}, #{security}, #{zip_code}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{master_tel}, #{broker_tel}, #{memo}, 'A', NOW(), #{id}, NOW(), #{id})

/* jointBrokerage_detail_save */ INSERT INTO JOINT_BROKERAGE_DETAIL (J_IDX, TYPE, HOUSE_TYPE, PRICE, RENT_PRICE, FEE, REG_DATE, REG_ID) VALUES (#{idx}, #{type}, #{house_type}, #{price}, #{rent_price}, #{fee}, NOW(), #{id})
mapper.delete: /* jointBrokerage_img_delete */ DELETE FROM JOINT_IMG WHERE J_IDX = #{idx}
mapper.insert: /* jointBrokerage_img_save */ INSERT INTO JOINT_IMG(J_IDX, IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME, ORDER_NUM, REG_DATE, REG_ID) VALUES(#{j_idx} , #{img_path}, #{img_name}, #{order_num}, NOW(), #{id})
mapper.select: /* get_jointBrokerage */ SELECT IDX, SHARE_YN, TITLE, TYPE, VIDEO_NAME, VIDEO_PATH, ALL_AREA, EXCLUSIVE_AREA, COMMON_AREA, MAINTENANCE_COST, MAINTENANCE_COST_LIST, MAINTENANCE_COST_OUT_LIST, ALL_PARKING_CNT, ONE_PARKING_CNT, DIRECTION, HEATING_SYSTEM, BUILT_IN_YN, ELEVATOR_YN, VERANDA_YN, PURPOSE, APPROVAL_DATE, `OPTION`, SECURITY, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, MASTER_TEL, BROKER_TEL, MEMO, REGDATE, REGID, MODDATE, MODID, STATUS FROM JOINT_BROKERAGE WHERE IDX = #{idx}
